programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Fun Lovin' Love Birds Glide Into Adventure
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-married David and Justin both work long hours in education. When the school year is over, they go abroad for adventure. Kinga shows them there is plenty to do in their own backyard in Cincinnati.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: What's On The Menu, Baltimore? Seafood Feast
programme.desc: Crab, oyster, shrimp...check, check, check! Find out why Baltimore's seafood scene reigns supreme as we explore all the underwater offerings this Chesapeake city has to offer.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Who's Got The Sauce?
programme.desc: Chef Aaron Poret of Bywater American Bistro goes head to head with Chef Jas Rogers, Owner and Creator of Saucex Dat. Will fried dough foil Chef Poret’s chances of success, or will he rise to Chef Rogers’ challenge?

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: Are Those Hitchhiking Spiders?
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero is not at the zoo – but he does have some questions about wild animal stories to ask his Queen City contestants.

programme.title: Rickwood: The Soul of Birmingham
programme.desc: This is the story of the oldest professional ballpark in the U.S. and the determination of its home team, the Black Barons. The voice of Rickwood tells the tale of its pivotal role in The Negro League, Black history and its legacy in American sports.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Law & H2Order
programme.desc: Splish splash, will the would-be criminals take a bath? These wild stories wind up in bodies of water that you have to see to believe.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Miya Marcano Story
programme.desc: When homesick college student Miya Marcano books a flight to south Florida for the weekend, her family is thrilled. But when the plane lands, Miya is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Re-creating Cornmeal Catfish vs. Red Curry Thai Spaghetti
programme.desc: In this battle, it's a clash of comfort food. Chef Pom Moongauklang of Pom Pom’s Sandwicheria & Tea House in The Milk District takes on Chef Nikki Akins of Nikki’s Place in the Parramore District. It’s Catfish versus Mackerel on Blind Kitchen.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Euro Vibes in Solvang, CA
programme.desc: Answer: This European candy is made on a bowling alley lane. Question: What is, you’ll have to watch this episode to find out? In southern California, we explore a thriving Danish community where Christmas shopping is always in season.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Baltimore Invests in the Next Generation
programme.desc: From ice hockey to lacrosse to tennis, Baltimore coaches help drive the next generation to find family, inspiration and pride through sports.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Strangest Situations to Ever Go Down at Police Stations
programme.desc: A fugitive escapes through the ceiling. A man plows his car into the police station. These shocking stories prove cops don't even have to leave the building to encounter the unpredictable.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Singing for Reggie and Singing with Jimmy
programme.desc: Meet Reggie, a Greenville singer who lost his voice due to throat cancer. Justin and Ryan fulfill their promise by performing one of his songs to a theater filled with their fans. Later, Jimmy hits the streets to spread joy by serenading locals.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: New In Town & Ready For Love
programme.desc: Ciera is a recent Kansas City transplant who is about to meet three bachelors in the city. - As she embarks on three blind dates, she’ll see what it takes to be a ninja warrior, get a private cooking lesson and try her hand at fluid art.

programme.title: Maddy & Dixie Take Sactown
programme.sub-title: Maddy & Dixie Take Sactown: Ballin' On A Budget
programme.desc: Having a little fun on the town is great but it's even better when you're doing it thriftily. Join Maddy & Dixie as they make a little cash go a long way, seeking out the best activities that’ll have you ballin’ on a budget!

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: Deep Dish Teacher Squares Off Against Lawyer Turned Pasta-Preneur
programme.desc: Former teacher Craig Falk is hitting the (cook)books against former lawyer Laurie Boucher. Which of these second-career chefs best showcases their culinary skills to craft the perfect packed lunch?

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown & Beyond: Falling in Love
programme.desc: Rob savors New England’s changing fall colors and crisp weather with a hot air balloon ride and visit to a lighthouse with killer views.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Bath tubs, parking lots and living rooms -- sometimes, babies like to make dramatic entrances into the world.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: Host Frank Nicotero asks contestants questions about the wildest, wackiest news stories. In "Peculiar Properties," he quizzes locals about a house shaped like apparel, a teeny tiny house and a basement with a shocking surprise.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: West By Orphan Train
programme.desc: A gripping documentary uncovering real stories of children loaded on trains, sent west, and presented “for the picking.” From 1854 to 1929, over 6,000 children landed in Iowa communities. Discover their emotional journeys and impact on the Midwest.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Shift: The Ragbrai Documentary
programme.desc: A celebration of the oldest, largest, and longest recreational touring bicycle ride in the world. Three riders and a pair of community leaders reach new personal heights, changing their lives along the seven day ride across Iowa.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.desc: From professional hockey players to award-winning muralists, The Spark highlights the craft, the journey, and the joy. These masters and thought leaders may have made names for themselves on the national stage, but they never forget the city that sparks their inspiration daily

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Fried and Tried Midwest Foods to Excite Your Palate
programme.desc: Dive into the Midwest's fried delights. From Friday night fish fries to tasty testicles and fried grilled cheese? Enjoy the area's most iconic and delectable crispy fried goodness.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Women's Day: Nurturing Nurse Steps Up To The Front Line For A Day Full Of Surprises
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project
programme.desc: Join WGAL News 8's Anne Shannon for "Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project," where we relive the best of 2024 through the eyes of our award-winning photojournalists.

programme.title: Game On: Fight for the Kings
programme.desc: Game On: Fight for the Kings is a KCRA 3 documentary with never-before-heard stories of the four-month fight, the friendships garnered between the rival cities, and Sacramento doing the unimaginable: winning the battle for the Kings.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: White-Collar Crimes
programme.desc: These criminals may not have blood on their hands, but they still leave despair in their wake. From shady non-profits to fraudulent contractors, to wide-spread postal theft, here are some of the most devastating white-collar crimes to be attempted across the country.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.
